verses.verse: Let him <S%H5401>kiss<s%> me with the <S%H5390>kisses<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> for your <S%H1730>love<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H3196>wine.<s%>

Your <S%H8081>oils<s%> have a <S%H2896>pleasing<s%> <S%H7381>fragrance.<s%> Your <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H8081>oil<s%> poured <S%H7324>forth,<s%> therefore the <S%H5959>virgins<s%> love <S%H157>you.<s%>

<S%H4900>Take<s%> me away <S%H310>with<s%> <S%H7323>you.<s%> Let us hurry. The <S%H4428>king<s%> has <S%H935>brought<s%> me into his <S%H2315>rooms.<s%> Friends We will be <S%H1523>glad<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in <S%H2142>you.<s%> We will praise your <S%H1730>love<s%> more than <S%H3196>wine!<s%> Beloved They are <S%H4339>right<s%> to love <S%H157>you.<s%>
I am <S%H7838>dark,<s%> but <S%H5000>lovely,<s%> you <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> like <S%H6938>Kedar<s%>'s <S%H168>tents,<s%> like <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>'s <S%H3407>curtains.<s%>

<S%H7200>Don't<s%> stare at me because I am <S%H7840>dark,<s%> because the <S%H8121>sun<s%> has <S%H7805>scorched<s%> <S%H517>me.<s%> My mother's <S%H1121>sons<s%> were <S%H2787>angry<s%> with <S%H7760>me.<s%> They made me <S%H5201>keeper<s%> of the <S%H3754>vineyards.<s%> I <S%H5201>haven't<s%> kept my own <S%H3754>vineyard.<s%>

<S%H5046>Tell<s%> <S%H5315>me,<s%> you whom my soul <S%H157>loves,<s%> <S%H349>where<s%> you <S%H7462>graze<s%> your <S%H349>flock,<s%> where you <S%H7257>rest<s%> them at <S%H6672>noon;<s%> <S%H4100>For<s%> why should I be as one who is veiled beside the <S%H5739>flocks<s%> of your <S%H2270>companions?<s%> Lover

If you <S%H3045>don't<s%> know, most <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> among <S%H802>women,<s%> <S%H3318>follow<s%> the <S%H6119>tracks<s%> of the <S%H6629>sheep.<s%> <S%H7462>Graze<s%> your young <S%H1429>goats<s%> beside the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%>' <S%H4908>tents.<s%>
I have <S%H1819>compared<s%> <S%H7474>you,<s%> my love, to a <S%H5484>steed<s%> in <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H7393>chariots.<s%>
Your <S%H3895>cheeks<s%> are <S%H4998>beautiful<s%> with <S%H8447>earrings,<s%> your <S%H6677>neck<s%> with strings of <S%H2737>jewels.<s%>
We will <S%H6213>make<s%> you <S%H8447>earrings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> with <S%H5351>studs<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%> Beloved
While the <S%H4428>king<s%> sat at his <S%H4524>table,<s%> my <S%H5373>perfume<s%> <S%H5414>spread<s%> its <S%H7381>fragrance.<s%>
My <S%H1730>beloved<s%> is to me a <S%H6872>sachet<s%> of <S%H4753>myrrh,<s%> that <S%H3885>lies<s%> between my <S%H7699>breasts.<s%>
My <S%H1730>beloved<s%> is to me a <S%H811>cluster<s%> of henna <S%H3724>blossoms<s%> from the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> of En <S%H5872>Gedi.<s%> Lover
<S%H3303>Behold,<s%> you are beautiful, my <S%H7474>love.<s%> <S%H3303>Behold,<s%> you are beautiful. Your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are <S%H3123>doves.<s%> Beloved
<S%H3303>Behold,<s%> you are beautiful, my <S%H1730>beloved,<s%> <S%H5273>yes,<s%> pleasant; and our <S%H6210>couch<s%> is <S%H7488>verdant.<s%> Lover
The <S%H6982>beams<s%> of our <S%H1004>house<s%> are <S%H730>cedars.<s%> Our <S%H7351>rafters<s%> are <S%H1266>firs.<s%>
